name: Worse!
description:
What's worse than when your framerate starts to slip? Or when your speakers blow out? Worse! is a game in which your good performance makes, well, your performance worse. Explore the procedurally-generated maze. Collect the coins. With each one, the graphical and audio fidelity of the game will reduce. And to make matters worse, you hear strange voices. Seems like something--or some things--are after you. Hopefully they won't keep you from a new high score. Now, if only your window would stop resizing itself...

Developed for Ludum Dare 40 as a Compo submission
